index.title: Political Compass Portugal
index.subtitle: Discover where you stand on the Portuguese political spectrum of 2026 through an in-depth analysis of various programmatic indicators, collected from each party's political programs.
index.privacyDesc: All your answers are stored locally on your device. We do not collect or share any personal data.

about.title: About Political Compass Portugal
about.subtitle: An educational tool to understand the Portuguese political spectrum
about.purposeDesc: Political Compass Portugal was born from the need to create a deep and impartial tool that helps Portuguese people better understand their position on the political spectrum. Unlike other superficial quizzes, we analyze 4 political dimensions through 100 carefully crafted questions.
about.depthDesc: 100 questions covering 8 thematic categories for a complete analysis of your political convictions.
about.impartialityDesc: Objective analysis based on official political programs, without ideological or partisan bias.
about.privacyDesc: Your data never leaves your browser. Total privacy and control over your answers.
about.updatedDesc: Party positions updated for 2026, reflecting the current Portuguese political reality.
about.fourDimensionsDesc: We analyze your position on 4 fundamental axes:
about.economicAxis: Economic: Left (state intervention) vs Right (free market)
about.authorityAxis: Authority: Libertarian (individual freedoms) vs Authoritarian (order and control)
about.sovereigntyAxis: Sovereignty: Globalist (European integration) vs Nationalist (national sovereignty)
about.methodologyDesc: Each question has specific weights for each dimension, based on analysis of political programs. You can also indicate the importance of each topic to you, refining the results.
about.comparisonDesc: We position all Portuguese parties legally registered today in the same political space, allowing you to see which parties are closest to your convictions through 4D Euclidean distance calculation.
about.transparencyDesc: This project was developed with the help of generative AI assistants, but all weights and positions were carefully reviewed to ensure impartiality. We are open to suggestions and corrections from the community.
about.limitationsDesc: It is important to understand that no questionnaire can perfectly capture the complexity of your political convictions. The results are an educational approximation, not a voting recommendation. We encourage critical thinking and independent analysis.
about.contactDesc: We value your feedback. If you found any errors, have suggestions for improvement, or questions about the methodology, please contact us through our

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have suggestions or found an error? Get in touch with us.
contact.githubDesc: This is an impartial project. You can report issues or share suggestions through the GitHub repository:
contact.feedbackDesc: We greatly value your feedback! If you have suggestions to improve the questionnaire, found any inaccuracies in party positions, or have ideas for new features, please use the
contact.impartialityNote: This is an impartial project. All suggestions will be carefully analyzed to maintain the quality and neutrality of the questionnaire.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.yourPrivacyDesc: This is a free educational project. We take your privacy seriously and keep everything as simple as possible.
privacy.dataStaysDesc: Your questionnaire answers and results are stored only in your browser (localStorage). We never send this data to any server. You can delete everything at any time by clearing your browser data.
privacy.sharingDesc: When you share your results, only your political scores are included in the URL. No personal information is shared.
privacy.questionsDesc: If you have questions about privacy, you can contact us through the

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.aboutServiceDesc: Political Compass Portugal is a free educational tool that helps you understand your position on the Portuguese political spectrum through a 100-question questionnaire.
terms.educationalDesc: This website is for purely educational purposes. The results are approximations based on party political programs and information collected from the internet, and do not constitute political advice or voting recommendations.
terms.impartialityDesc: We are committed to keeping this project impartial. The questions are based on objective analysis of political programs. Suggestions for improvement are welcome through our
terms.usageDesc: This is a free service provided "as is". Please use it responsibly and do not attempt to interfere with its operation.
terms.changesDesc: We may update these terms occasionally. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this page.

resultsPage.methodologyDesc1: Proximity is calculated through Euclidean distance in a multidimensional space that includes the 4 axes (Economy, Authority, Society and Sovereignty).
resultsPage.methodologyDesc2: The value reflects the compatibility between your position and the official party programs for 2026.
resultsPage.shareText: My political profile for 2026! Closest party: {{party}}.

bussola.confirmDesc: You have an ongoing quiz. Starting a new one will delete your current progress.
